results.description: Core: long stocks where forward_price_10 > option_breakeven_10 (positive spread) and short when negative. SUGGESTION1 applied: uses 2 datafields (forward_price_10, option_breakeven_10). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3 not applied (coverage ~0.7037/0.7057 > 0.6). SUGGESTION4 partially applied: both fields have moderate userCount (forward_price_10 userCount=368, option_breakeven_10 userCount=218) so signal likely observable. KEEP_IN_MINDs honored: single line implementation, <=2 datafields, <=7 operators. Confidence: 0.75.

Core: forward_price_20 minus option_breakeven_20 as short-term forward mispricing signal. SUGGESTION1 applied (forward_price_20, option_breakeven_20). SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage >0.6). SUGGESTION4 used moderate userCounts. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence: 0.72.

Core: forward_price_30 - option_breakeven_30 to capture near-term implied mispricing. SUGGESTION1 applied (two fields). SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not applied (coverage ~0.70). SUGGESTION4: both fields have reasonable userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.73.

Core: forward_price_60 - option_breakeven_60 to detect medium-term forward premium/discount. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not required (coverage >0.6). SUGGESTION4: forward_price_60 userCount=170 lower but acceptable. KEEP_IN_MIND followed. Confidence: 0.68.

Core: forward_price_90 - option_breakeven_90 for quarter horizon mispricing. SUGGESTION1 used (two fields). SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not applied (coverage ~0.7037). SUGGESTION4 medium userCounts; implemented compactly. Confidence: 0.70.

Core: forward_price_120 - option_breakeven_120 to capture seasonal/earnings effects. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION3 unnecessary (coverage >0.6). SUGGESTION4 moderate userCounts. KEEP_IN_MIND obeyed. Confidence: 0.67.

Core: forward_price_150 - option_breakeven_150 for medium-long horizon mispricing. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not applied. SUGGESTION4 userCounts are lower but still valid. Implementation kept short. Confidence: 0.64.

Core: forward_price_180 - option_breakeven_180 to detect half-year forward anomalies. SUGGESTION1 used. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not required. SUGGESTION4 moderate support from userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND kept. Confidence: 0.66.

Core: forward_price_270 - option_breakeven_270 to capture longer-term deviations. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4: forward_price_270 userCount=137 smaller; confidence modest. KEEP_IN_MIND followed. Confidence: 0.63.

Core: forward_price_360 - option_breakeven_360 for annual-horizon mispricing. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 lower userCounts give lower confidence. Implementation concise. Confidence: 0.62.

Core: forward_price_720 - option_breakeven_720 to detect long-term structural mispricing. SUGGESTION1 used. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not applied (coverage >0.6). SUGGESTION4 userCount moderate; expect more noise. Confidence: 0.61.

Core: call_breakeven_10 - put_breakeven_10 as put-call skew/bias indicator. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). SUGGESTION2 N/A (no vector). SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage>0.7). SUGGESTION4: call_breakeven_10 userCount=1003 strong; put_breakeven_10 userCount=409 good â€” increases confidence. KEEP_IN_MIND honored. Confidence: 0.82.

Core: call_breakeven_20 - put_breakeven_20 to gauge short-term skew. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 userCounts moderate. KEEP_IN_MIND observed. Confidence: 0.74.

Core: call_breakeven_30 - put_breakeven_30 to capture monthly skew. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not applied. SUGGESTION4 moderate support. Implementation concise. Confidence: 0.72.

Core: call_breakeven_60 - put_breakeven_60 for 2-month skew signal. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 userCounts lower; confidence reduced. KEEP_IN_MIND followed. Confidence: 0.66.
Core: call_breakeven_90 - put_breakeven_90 to capture 3-month skew. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not necessary. SUGGESTION4 moderate support. Confidence: 0.68.

Core: call_breakeven_120 - put_breakeven_120 to identify directional bias at 4-month horizon. SUGGESTION1 used. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not applied. SUGGESTION4 lower userCounts so moderate confidence. KEEP_IN_MIND met. Confidence: 0.64.

Core: call_breakeven_150 - put_breakeven_150 to detect medium-term skew. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 limited data support reduces confidence. Confidence: 0.61.
Core: call_breakeven_180 - put_breakeven_180 for half-year skew. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not applied. SUGGESTION4 moderate. KEEP_IN_MIND kept. Confidence: 0.62.

Core: call_breakeven_270 - put_breakeven_270 long-horizon skew. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 userCounts lower but pcr_oi_270 is strong (used elsewhere). Confidence: 0.60.
Core: call_breakeven_360 - put_breakeven_360 annual skew indicator. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not required. SUGGESTION4 limited support; expect noise. Confidence: 0.58.

Core: call_breakeven_720 - put_breakeven_720 very long-horizon skew. SUGGESTION1 used. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Data sparsity may increase noise; confidence conservative. Confidence: 0.57.

Core: option_breakeven_10 / forward_price_10 as normalized mispricing metric. SUGGESTION1 applied (two fields). SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not required. SUGGESTION4 moderate userCounts support normalization. KEEP_IN_MIND observed. Confidence: 0.74.

Core: option_breakeven_20 / forward_price_20 to scale breakeven by forward. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage>0.6). SUGGESTION4 moderate support. Confidence: 0.71.

Core: option_breakeven_60 / forward_price_60 for scaled medium-term signal. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not required. SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence: 0.67.

Core: option_breakeven_720 / forward_price_720 very long-term normalized breakeven. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Coverage OK. Confidence: 0.58.

Core: ts_zscore(pcr_oi_10,20) to detect extreme put-call open-interest imbalance short-term. SUGGESTION1 applied (single field). SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not applied (coverage>0.7). SUGGESTION4 userCount moderate (pcr_oi_10 userCount=449). KEEP_IN_MIND: single field, single operator. Confidence: 0.76.
Core: ts_zscore(pcr_oi_20,20) to flag imbalances. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. Confidence: 0.74.

Core: subtract(pcr_oi_270, pcr_oi_10) to see whether long-horizon positioning diverges from short-term OI. SUGGESTION1 applied (two fields). SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 leverages pcr_oi_270's large userCount to stabilize measure. KEEP_IN_MIND observed. Confidence: 0.88.
Core: subtract(pcr_oi_270, pcr_oi_20) comparing long vs short OI. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not applied. SUGGESTION4 strong anchor (270d). Confidence: 0.87.
Core: subtract(pcr_oi_270, pcr_oi_30) to detect shifts between monthly and long-term OI. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Confidence: 0.86.

Core: subtract(pcr_oi_270, pcr_oi_120) long vs 4-month OI slope. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Confidence: 0.82.
Core: subtract(pcr_oi_270, pcr_oi_150) to capture mid-term divergence from long positioning. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Confidence: 0.8.

Core: subtract(pcr_oi_270, pcr_oi_180) comparing two long maturities to identify term shifts. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Both fields have good userCounts; confidence higher. Confidence: 0.86.
Core: subtract(pcr_oi_270, pcr_oi_360) medium-long term OI slope. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Confidence: 0.78.
Core: subtract(pcr_oi_270, pcr_oi_720) to detect imbalance between long-term buckets. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Expect more noise; confidence moderate. Confidence: 0.75.

results.idea: PCR OI all / PCR Vol all
results.description: Core: divide(pcr_oi_all, pcr_vol_all) to capture whether open-interest imbalance is supported by trading volume (structural vs transient). SUGGESTION1 applied (pcr_oi_all, pcr_vol_all). SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not applied (coverage>0.7). SUGGESTION4: both fields moderate userCounts. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.74.

Core: ts_ir(ts_returns(forward_price_30,5),20) measures information ratio of short returns to assess persistence. SUGGESTION1 applied (single field). SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount for forward_price_30. KEEP_IN_MIND: two operators only. Confidence: 0.73.

Core: divide(call_breakeven_10, forward_price_10) to assess whether calls price in premium relative to forward. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 call_breakeven_10 userCount high (1003) -> higher confidence. Confidence: 0.8.
